name: French: O-Level Revision and CSE
overview: French: O-Level Revision and CSE is just that.. It is a series of educational tools/games to test the user and help him/her brush up on his/her French language skills. contains "Lexis 1", "Lexis 2", "French Verbs", "French Comprehension" and "La France" This was a software program designed to help students obtain their O-Level French in the UK. However, the year after this software was released the O-Level system was replaced, making the software pretty much obsolete by the time it reached its first year on the market.
